message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $11,000?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $11,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $9,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To make this happen quickly, I'll come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $10,500. I'd be willing to go up to $10,000, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
